participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is resilient and determined, always looking for new opportunities despite her recent job loss.
participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i love playing softball. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is imaginative and playful, enjoying her time with dolls and her pet turtle.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i have a pet turtle. i'm four.
